roleset.name: force into an action with threat of violence
roleset.note: BULLY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bully' based on wsj; nominal 'bullying' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls captain-29.8-1, force-59-1. (from bully.01-v)
BULLYING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from bullying.01-n)

example.name: bully-v: unstated action
example.text: According to testimony in a public, 80-page grand-jury report handed up to the state attorney general, Judge O'Kicki extorted cash from lawyers, muscled favorable loans from banks and bullied local businesses for more than a decade.

example.name: bully-v: with action
example.text: Her sister-in-law (Amy Wright) is a sniveling prude afraid that Kate will seduce all the married men in town, including a particularly loathsome fellow named Tucker, whose idea of fun is to leave his wife at home tending to her bruises and cigarette burns, while he bullies Kate into a dance that consists of drooling on her while trying to break her ribs.
example.arg: into a dance that consists of drooling on her while trying to break her ribs

example.name: bullying-n
example.text: An 18-year-old Beaufort man was arrested on Friday, May 31, for reportedly filming his bullying of children at a playground.
